titleStmt.title: The grand indictment of high-treason against the Marquess of Argyle, at the instance of His Majesites advocat: exhibited to the Parliament of Scotland, with an account of what hath followed since thereupon.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
With a caption title: "Edinburgh, at the Parliament-House February 13. 1661" beginning a separate pagination and register.
reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
